page.title: 05TOURISM IN MEOPHAM AREA
page.content: A few tourists come to Meopham, they come from Canada, America, Japan, Yugoslavia, India, Australia and they sometimes come from Germany. The tourists come to Meopham to see the cricket on the Green, the big Windmill and the Cricketers Public House. A long time ago, a man from the Cricketers Public House said, "Whoever puts the ball through the Cricketers window will get Â£5O."Someone did it about six years ago. His name was Brian Sambrook, and it happened in l979. Outside the Cricketers Public House is a flag with the initials M.C.C. _ Meopham Cricket Club. The tourists like the Cricketers because it is like an old typical English pub and it is by the Green.The tourists like to take photographs of the flag because the initials M.C.C. are very famous.
